plates of Poland|Car plates]] | blank_info = ZS | website = | footnotes = }} '''Krzekowo-Bezrzecze''' is a municipal neighbourhood of the city of [[Szczecin]], [[Poland]] situated on the left bank of [[Oder river]], west of the [[Stare Miasto, Szczecin|Szczecin Old Town]] and [[Śródmieście, Szczecin|Middle Town]], in [[Zachód, Szczecin|Zachód (West) District]]. As of January 2011 it had a population of 3,644.<ref>{{cite website|url=http://bip.um.szczecin.pl/umszczecinbip/chapter_50049.asp|title=Zestawienie informacyjne o liczbie osób zameldowanych w Szczecinie|accessdate=2011-01-29|publisher=Urząd Miasta Szczecin|language=Polish}}</ref> Krzekowo-Bezrzecze comprises [[Krzekowo]] and [[Bezrzecze, Szczecin|Bezrzecze]]. == References == {{reflist}} {{Szczecin}} {{WestPomeranian-geo-stub}} [[Category:Neighbourhoods of Szczecin|Krzekowo Bezrzecze]]
